}} 'Bernhard Langer' (born 27 August 1957) is a German professional golfer. He
is a two-time Masters champion, and was one of the world's leading golfers
throughout the 1980s and 90s, being the first official number one ranked player
in 1986. After turning fifty, he became one of the most successful players on
the Champions Tour. ]]
categories: Winners of men's major golf championships
